__e: Madam, it has been my extreme pleasure talking with your daughter.
I guess she's just thrilled to be nesting.
And this... Can I just say what an absolute pleasure this is?

And I also have to say that you had to recognize it right at the beginning from Harriet's point of view... as a very true love, an immense love... and that it would be a lifelong love, which I think it has been.
I mean, you have a huge heart, and I love that about you. But I don't trust you.
There's loads of little people with immense talent, and that's what I'm trying to show the world.
